title: [Cleric Guild, Alchemic Nexus]
description: This octagonal stone chamber is lit by eight flickering torches, one positioned at each corner.  The highly polished white tile floor extends to each of six open doorways.  A gap in the tile between each door allows the warmth of the shifting lava to heat the room.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, east, south, west, northwest, down, out
